paper_abstract: In this paper, we investigate the following additive functional inequality: N(f(x) + f(y) + f(z) + f(w), t) >= N (f(x) + f(y + z + w), t) in fuzzy normed modules over a fuzzy C*-algebra, which is applied to understand homomorphisms in fuzzy C*-algebras.
paper_title: ULAM-GAVRUTA-RASSIAS STABILITY OF AN ADDITIVE FUNCTIONAL INEQUALITY IN FUZZY NORMED MODULES
